responses: Think about it, will ya, Mee6? What, you wanna fix all the things that go wrong? You wanna snap your fingers and erase your screw-ups? :middle_finger:

bad responses: You're an insignificant, blue, scrawny mistake made for discord, and your only purpose in life is to say hello to new people while being verbally attacked by me, you malnourished blueberry.
